'''Troupe's Dawnlight''' is an [[Artifact]] in the set [[Wanderer's Troupe]].

==Description==
A small flower-shaped insignia. There seems to be music coming from it.

Among the members of the troupe was a [[Dawnlight Swordswoman|charismatic swordswoman]].<br>Beautiful as the light on water, elegant as the chirping lark.<br>Her every slash hummed a tune of the wind.

The end of each song and dance was like the sun after the rain.<br>Dust has since settled, and both the stage and life itself feel emptier for the absence of her music.

Both her music and her [[The Flute|sword]] were as lethal as they were beautiful.<br>This was in keeping with the troupe's performances, which were intended for two very different audiences.<br>For the audience of foes, the music drifted far beyond the stage.
